member.name: T:Row
member.summary: Methods for working with 1 dimension arrays

member.name: M:Init
member.summary: Creates a 1 dimensional array of the specified size and fills it with the specified values.
member.return: A number that identifies created array (a.k.a. array handle)

member.name: M:Delete
member.param: a number that identifies array (a.k.a. array handle)

member.name: M:Read
member.summary: Read index value from 1 dimensional array.
member.param: a number that identifies array (a.k.a. array handle)

member.name: M:Write
member.summary: Write index value to 1 dimensional array.
member.param: a number that identifies array (a.k.a. array handle)

member.name: M:Size
member.param: a number that identifies array (a.k.a. array handle)

member.name: M:Resize
member.param: a number that identifies array (a.k.a. array handle)
